Archives

Slides, videos and other stuff from Pass the SALT and RMLL Security tracks.

Pass the SALT

We are going to populate year after year our archives with slides, videos and pictures to keep track of all the work produced by our dedicated speakers but also of memories of good vibes.

RMLL Security tracks

As said in "About" page, Pass the SALT founders have curated during 10 years the Security track of the RMLL (French generalist FLOSS conference). It has been such a great experience with lot of good memories, friends and talks. You will find below the slides (with some pics and interviews). Videos are coming.
